Title: Requires motor vehicle liability insurance policies to include supplemental spousal liability coverage unless the insured declines such coverage in writing
Summary: Requires motor vehicle liability insurance policies to include supplemental spousal liability coverage unless the insured declines such coverage in writing.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to the provision of supplemental spousal liability insurance to persons who are insured for loss resulting from the ownership, maintenance and use of a motor vehicle
